mention.text: 19 jan 90 -- today , a salvadoran judge ordered the `` provisional arrest '' of one salvadoran colonel and eight other members of the salvadoran army involved in the massacre of six jesuit priests
judge of the san salvador fourth criminal court
director of a salvadoran military academy
ricardo zamora , judge of the san salvador fourth criminal court
